title: Mission Workshop Ultralight Bucket Hat
content:
Keeping the sun off your neck and ears is the key to maintaining healthy skin and weâ€™re all about sun hats and bucket hats. Mission Workshop, pioneers of outdoor-oriented tech gear, just announced an Ultralight Bucket Hat ($75), that reimagines an outdoor classic utilizing an ultra-lightweight and durable fabric by Italian textile mill Olmetex. These hats come in two sizes, S/M, and L/XL.

Designed for both versatility and performance, the breathable, moisture-wicking textile keeps you cool during high-intensity activities while providing complete sun protection. A PFC-free DWR finish adds water resistance, allowing it to shed light rain and dry quickly. Wrinkle-resistant and packable for easy travel and available in two sizes with an adjustable back toggle for a tailored, comfortable fit.

Pack it in your bag for the next desert trip, put it on at camp or on breaks. Check out more at Mission Workshop.
